name: KILLBIT
description:
You have to cheat but do not get caught! The Brick Studios is a bunch of psychopaths! Did you hear the rumor about they sending killers to cheaters house? 

This game made for Atom Game Jam #2.

How To Play

Mouse - Look Around

 TAB - Switch between pc and normal vision 

LMB Click - Click

LMB Hold - Drag the apps and windows

 E - Interact

If the terminal is full, use the "clear" command.

The Brick Game Studios are very "careful" about cheaters. According to a rumor, if you cheat in their games, they'll send an assassin to your home so you should turn your lights off if you hear sounds in your house. Of course, this isn't right, or is it?

Codes

clear, break, tree, key, help, disconnect, <hashID>, <name>, at0m(cheat code)

Back Story of the Game

A year ago The Brick Game Studios depreciated by 82% cause of a cheater. Now they are about to bankruptcy. Because of that, they are very careful about cheaters. If there is any doubt that you are cheating you'll be got banned. But some people saying they can't reach their friends who have cheated before.

Asset

Everything in the game except some sounds is made by Remoob in three days. Some sound effects from "freesound.org" and MadRooster SFX Pack.

Known Bugs: 

The game is fast if your refresh rate > 144 Hz (that means if you decrease your refresh rate game is going to be easier :P)

If you try to flick on the light switch, it has a small possibility to can't re-open.

You can drag windows out of the screen.

The game doesn't support some resolutions.

NOTE: Third edition(killBitv3.0) is better but if you are a psychopath you can always choose the other two.

FACT: Walking sounds are not deadly, That means somebody something is near. But nobody can't say the same for the door.
